member.name: T:CoronaLabs.Corona.WinRT.Phone.CoronaPanel
member.summary: Corona Xaml control used to execute a Corona project's Lua scripts and render its content via Direct3D.

member.name: P:CoronaLabs.Corona.WinRT.Phone.CoronaPanel.AutoLaunchEnabled
member.summary: Sets whether or not this control will automatically start the Corona runtime when loaded onto the page.

summary.para: Gets the settings to be used when this control automatically starts up the Corona runtime when loaded onto the page.
Only applicable when the property has been set to true.

member.name: P:CoronaLabs.Corona.WinRT.Phone.CoronaPanel.BackgroundContentProvider
member.summary: Gets an object used to render content to a DrawingSurfaceBackgroundGrid Xaml control if the property is set to true.

member.name: P:CoronaLabs.Corona.WinRT.Phone.CoronaPanel.BackgroundManipulationHandler
member.summary: Gets an object used to receive touch input from a DrawingSurfaceBackgroundGrid Xaml control if the property is set to true.

member.name: P:CoronaLabs.Corona.WinRT.Phone.CoronaPanel.BackgroundRenderingEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether or not Corona will render content within this control's bounds or to a DrawingSurfaceBackgroundGrid Xaml control.

member.name: P:CoronaLabs.Corona.WinRT.Phone.CoronaPanel.Children
member.summary: Gets a collection of child UI elements/control to be displayed within the Corona panel's bounds.

member.name: P:CoronaLabs.Corona.WinRT.Phone.CoronaPanel.RenderSurface
member.summary: Gets the 3D rendering surface that the Corona runtime renders to.

member.name: P:CoronaLabs.Corona.WinRT.Phone.CoronaPanel.Runtime
member.summary: Gets a Corona runtime used to run, suspend, resume, and terminate a Corona project.
